categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: During the Galactic Civil War, an attack was carried out by Rebel Alliance forces under Luke Skywalker on the Executor-class Star Dreadnought Enforcer near Bespin. After the arrival of additional Imperial ships, the Rebels were forced to retreat. The Enforcer sustained heavy damage during the attack and had to be repaired at an orbital facility above Phaylenn.
